title: Terms of Use
subtitle: Rules governing the use of the Dandela Academy platform
hero-description: These terms of use define the rules for accessing and using the Dandela Academy platform. By using our services, you agree to these terms in full.

chapters.title: Purpose
chapters.subtitle: Dandela Academy is a training platform offering courses, learning sessions, assessments, and certifications. These terms aim to define the conditions of use of these services.

chapters.title: Access to the platform
chapters.subtitle: Access to certain features requires creating a user account. You agree to provide accurate information and keep your login credentials confidential.

subchapters.title: Management and security of user accounts:
content: A user can only have one account
You are responsible for any activity performed from your account

chapters.title: Roles and access
chapters.subtitle: Certain pages or features are accessible only according to your role (student, teacher, administrator). Any unauthorized access attempt may result in account suspension or deletion.

subchapters.title: Use of educational content on the platform:
content: Educational content is for personal use only
Any reproduction or distribution without permission is prohibited
Materials remain the property of Dandela Academy or the instructors

chapters.title: Course enrollment
chapters.subtitle: Enrollment in a course or session is personal and non-transferable. Dandela Academy reserves the right to cancel a session in case of force majeure or insufficient participants.

chapters.title: Assessments and certifications
chapters.subtitle: Grades, results, and certifications issued are strictly related to the user's actual performance. Any attempt at fraud will result in cancellation of the relevant results.

subchapters.title: Expected behavior on the platform:
content: Prohibition of offensive, discriminatory, or illegal comments

chapters.title: Suspension and termination
chapters.subtitle: Dandela Academy reserves the right to suspend or delete an account for non-compliance with these terms, without notice or compensation.

chapters.title: Liability
chapters.subtitle: Dandela Academy strives to ensure service availability and quality but cannot be held responsible for temporary interruptions or data loss beyond its control.

chapters.title: Changes to terms
chapters.subtitle: These terms may be modified at any time. Users will be informed of significant changes. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

chapters.title: Applicable law
chapters.subtitle: These terms are governed by Swiss law. In case of dispute, the competent courts will be those at the Dandela Academy headquarters, unless otherwise legally required.
